channel.title: How to make floors? (e.g. grass)
channel.description:
Hi, does anyone know how to make floor objects useing makeglobalobject? i know this is the way how to make floor, but i dont know the id of any of them.:( Does anyone know any floor ids? I've searched some txt files i got, but those what ive found are decoraiton, or something else. I guess these are null-named. because null named objects usually can't be examined, and floors are normally not-examineable.
I need to know this, because i would like to make new places.

item.title: How to make floors? (e.g. grass)
item.dc:creator: @1337_king 1337 king
item.description:
@1337_king wrote:

[quote=“ii own ii, post:12, topic:47731”]Click help on the top of ur mopar and click object ids[/quote]No. that’s not right. because i cant seem to make grass with any function.
And i’m not that noob to haven’t have tried “help” button. I also got a fresh objectIDs.txt from somewhere. That’s not the problem. And most of the floors must be named “null” for example lava. try searching for lava in that. you wont find the floor object.

Read full topic

There MUST be a way to make these, and i will search for it on other forums, on google, until i find it.
If ANYBODY finds it out, it could be really useful for everyone.

item.title: How to make floors? (e.g. grass)
item.dc:creator: @1337_king 1337 king
item.description:
@1337_king wrote:

doesnt seem to work, i make it like:
makeGlobalObject(10001,10001,3794,-1,22);
i put that in the login section, i mean where the messages show up when you login.
i teleport to the coordinates, but it WONT WORK. :([br][size=1]Posted on: January 14, 2007, 03:51:23 PM[/size][hr]Oh, i tried
Replacefloor(10001, 10001, 3794, -1);
too, but that wouldnt work either.

Read full topic

item.title: How to make floors? (e.g. grass)
item.dc:creator: @eambo eambo
item.description:
@eambo wrote:

Download moparscape, go to help, then click “object ID’s”

Grass is 3794/3795 =-)

Read full topic
